name: CoreMotionActivity
summary: Contains the data for a single motion update event.

properties.name: automotive
properties.summary: A Boolean indicating whether the device is in an automobile.

properties.name: confidence
properties.summary: The confidence in the assessment of the motion type.

properties.name: running
properties.summary: A Boolean indicating whether the device is on a running person.

properties.name: startDate
properties.summary: The time at which the change in motion occurred.

properties.name: stationary
properties.summary: A Boolean indicating whether the device is stationary.

properties.name: unknown
properties.summary: A Boolean indicating whether the type of motion is unknown.

properties.name: walking
properties.summary: A Boolean indicating whether the device is on a walking person.
